constantValues: Details and position information for a physical place where services are provided and resources and participants may be stored, found, contained or accommodated.

members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: The name of the city, town, village or other community or delivery center.

members.name: addressCountry

constantValues: Country - a nation as commonly understood or generally accepted.

members.description: Country - a nation as commonly understood or generally accepted.

members.name: addressDistinct

constantValues: The name of the administrative area (county).

members.description: The name of the administrative area (county).

members.name: addressLine1

constantValues: This component contains the house number, apartment number, street name, street direction, P.O. Box number, delivery hints, and similar address information

constantValues: Time period when address was/is in use.

members.description: Time period when address was/is in use.

members.name: addressPostalCode

constantValues: A postal code designating a region defined by the postal service.

members.description: A postal code designating a region defined by the postal service.

members.name: addressState

constantValues: Sub-unit of a country with limited sovereignty in a federally organized country. A code may be used if codes are in common use (i.e. US 2 letter state codes).

members.description: Sub-unit of a country with limited sovereignty in a federally organized country. A code may be used if codes are in common use (i.e. US 2 letter state codes).

members.name: addressText

constantValues: A full text representation of the address.

members.description: A full text representation of the address.

members.name: addressType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Distinguishes between physical addresses (those you can visit) and mailing addresses (e.g. PO Boxes and care-of addresses). Most addresses are both.

members.description: Distinguishes between physical addresses (those you can visit) and mailing addresses (e.g. PO Boxes and care-of addresses). Most addresses are both.

members.name: locationPositionAltitude

constantValues: Altitude. The value domain and the interpretation are the same as for the text of the altitude element in KML (see notes below)

members.description: Altitude. The value domain and the interpretation are the same as for the text of the altitude element in KML (see notes below)

constantValues: Latitude. The value domain and the interpretation are the same as for the text of the latitude element in KML

foreignKeyAttribute.name: managingOrganization

constantValues: The organization responsible for the provisioning and upkeep of the location.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The organization responsible for the provisioning and upkeep of the location.

members.name: mode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: operationalStatus

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The Operational status covers operation values most relevant to beds (but can also apply to rooms/units/chair/etc such as an isolation unit/dialysis chair).

members.description: The Operational status covers operation values most relevant to beds (but can also apply to rooms/units/chair/etc such as an isolation unit/dialysis chair).

foreignKeyAttribute.name: partOf

constantValues: Another Location which this Location is physically part of.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Another Location which this Location is physically part of.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: physicalType

constantValues: Physical form of the location, e.g. building, room, vehicle, road.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Physical form of the location, e.g. building, room, vehicle, road.

members.name: status

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The status property covers the general availability of the resource, not the current value which may be covered by the operationStatus, or by a schedule/slots if they are configured for the location.

members.description: The status property covers the general availability of the resource, not the current value which may be covered by the operationStatus, or by a schedule/slots if they are configured for the location.

addSupportingAttribute.name: status_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: type

constantValues: Indicates the type of function performed at the location.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Indicates the type of function performed at the location.

definitions.description: Details and position information for a physical place where services are provided and resources and participants may be stored, found, contained or accommodated.
